attributes.action: Consider the term "bouncer" to be politically incorrect and make it's use derogatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having been involved in the security industry for 30 years and seen many changes in terminology in so many other fields of expertise - why is it that the term "bouncer" is still used on radio and television and sadly within some members of the industry itself.
With the introduction of the SIA, anyone who is currently working in the security industry is receiving training, paying for a licence and insurance to work and needs to have a blemish free criminal record - yet still being referred to as a "bouncer". 
This is derogatory. 
I have never referred to anyone I've worked with, nor indeed myself as a "bouncer". Security is a profession - let's treat it as such.
